title: I want to start listening to classic rock music, so what songs should I begin with? In other words, do you have any song recommendations? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is much more complicated than you think. Classic Rock is not all the same, like any other genre it has levels. Some people/radio stations believe that Classic Rock encompasses songs of a certain age. It's how Bon Jovi got to be considered classic rock. The big guns of classic rock are as follows Chuck Berry The Beatles The Rolling Stones (before 1980) The Who. For these guys, start with the big hits and work your way in. Led Zeppelin is also a landmark band but you need to cherry pick the songs. I'd start with Black Dog, Rock and Roll, and then Stairway to Heaven. The Band Queen is often over played and over hyped but check out Under Pressure, Killer Queen, and Hammer to Fall I'd mention the early works of David Bowie, but it seems obvious. Check out Changes, Sufragette City, Rebel Rebel, Sound and Vision, and Golden Years. Some of the best Classic Rock songs are by lesser known bands or bands that are often overlooked. Black Betty by Ram Jam Radar Love by Golden Earring Aqualung by Jethro Tull White Rabbit by Jefferson Airplane Lola by The Kinks Running on Empty by Jackson Brown Night Moves by Bob Seger Foreplay/long time by Boston (there whole first album is awesome) White Room by Cream Stuck in the Middle by Stealers Wheel I have more, but half the fun is hunting around finding the good stuff. If you want more we can talk. I could even break stuff down by decade. Oh yeah…BTW the greatest American Classic Rock band (IMHO) is Creedence Clearwater Revival

I would recommend ; Queen : noble rock enabling you to listen to the most magical voice ever, the one and only Freddie Mercury and enjoy some amazing guitar riffs and piano playing. Deep Purple : come on you can’t have heard the staple song Smoke on the water give it a listen and you will immediately fall in love with it and want to listen to more tracks . Led Zeppelin : you will be introduced to a whole new level of music with the unique voice of Robert Plant and the awesome solos of Jimmy Page. Pink Floyd: Unique music style and lyrics accompanied by great bass and awesome tunes. Have a listen to the all time classic Money and you will be transported to the beauty and freedom of rock . Guns N' Roses : dive into the most magnificent experience . Get submerged to the amazing vocals of Axl rose and the out of this world solos of Slash. Listen to November rain and the essential Sweet child o mine first. Scorpions : the German band which changed the world of music. You will instantly recognize klaus’ voice just by listening to the Wind of Change and Send me an angel . The Doors : what else can I say. Go on and listen to the sexiest voice in rock , Jim Morrison. Amazing !! The Beatles : think everyone knows them and can easily make out their songs by their sound. It is a great start to the beginning of rock n roll with softer tunes and mild solos. The Jimi Hendrix experience : have a listen to The Godfather of the electric guitar and its riffs, back to where it all began. Purple Haze The Rolling Stones : you know Mick Jagger, don’t you ?listen to the immortal band starting off with the all time classics sympathy for the Devil and Satisfaction. Gary Moore : just listen to the awesomeness of still got the blues . After being accustomed to their sound you may want to experiment with a tougher sound. Here are some hard rock and metal bands and artists I hope you will love ; AC/DC Alice cooper Motorhead Black Sabbath Judas Priest Iron Maiden Metallica Megadeth Slayer Ozzy osbourne Pantera You may as well want to listen to Phil Collins, Europe, The Who, Elton John, Eric Clapton, Cream, Derek and the dominos Janis Joplin, John Lennon, Bon Jovi . Hope this helps !
